page.title: 12Families - Jonathan
page.content: My name is Jonathan Sinden, but I am usually called Jo. I am 8 and I have two older sisters. My Dad is a Chartered Accountant, but I'm not sure what that means. Mum and Dad own a shop in Harleston. We have lots of relations near Wenhaston, most of them are nice. I have a pet collie dog called Bronty and a cat called Kippy. We have three cars. We have a Riley which is 43 years old, a Ford Sierra and a Metro. I like the old Riley best. We live next to Mark Hardacre. When we had a holiday in France, I ate lots of croissants, we can buy them in Harleston. There is a dew pond on Blackheath, but it is drying up. We have been working on it for a topic at school. I love reading, especially encyclopedias and books about space.
